attributes.title: Windows 10 BREAKS Pirated Games?! Not exactly...
attributes.caption: Aug 19, 2015
attributes.description: Windows 10 is under fire TWICE over piracy: first over claims that it will invade your PC to shut down pirated software, and twice over admissions that it won't run games with old DRM. Should have known SecuROM an Safedisc would rise from their graves to annoy us one last time.
attributes.display_title: Windows 10 BREAKS Pirated Games?! Not exactly...

attributes.title: Hey Siri! Is Apple Out of Ideas?
attributes.caption: Sept 9, 2015
attributes.description: Apple announced a ton of stuff at their Hey Siri event: iphones, ipads, iOSes, watches, colors, pencils, tv boxes... but is any of it actually impressive
attributes.display_title: Hey Siri! Is Apple Out of Ideas?

attributes.title: CISA DEFEATS Your Privacy?!
attributes.caption: Dec 17, 2015
attributes.description: If there's one thing America loves, it's defeating stuff. Anti-Privacy bill CISA has failed before, under names like SOPA, but the government has a surefire way to win this time: put it in the budget... or else. Good job, boys! We did it! We defeated privacy!
